components.title: Card
components.description: This is a grouping of text and an image that looks like a card. The image goes to the edge of the container and the text is wrapped in a closed box with a background color.

components.title: Slat
components.description: This is a grouping of text and image(optional) that looks like a slat (a horizontal material sometimes used in architecture/building). It is borderless and the image often is hidden on small screens.

components.title: ScreenLink
components.description: This is a grouping of text and images where the text overlays on top of the image. The size of the element is determined by the size of the image. The whole thing is a single link

components.title: Well
components.description: This element is a basic container of content. It has a background and padding between the edge of the elemnt and the inner text. Anything could be inside here including lists, etc.

components.title: ListBox
components.description: ListBoxes typically hold a list or grid of other CSS objects. They often have a header and a footer.

components.title: SmallListBox
components.description: Basically the same purpose as ListBox, except this one is very small. Typically appears inside of sidebars, and its' list is typically stacked.

elements.title: Pagination
elements.description: Pagination is the menu for navigating a document that has been divided into discrete pages.

elements.title: Breadcrumbs
elements.description: Breadcrumbs provide links back to each previous page the user navigated through to get to the current page or—in hierarchical site structures—the parent pages of the current one. Breadcrumbs provide a trail for the user to follow back to the starting or entry point.

elements.title: CaptionImage
elements.description: An image with an optional caption and credit. This layout is often used when images are added via a WYSIWYG.

elements.title: HeaderNewsletter
elements.description: Newsletter signup form in the header area.

elements.title: HeaderSearch
elements.description: Search form in the header area.

elements.title: MobileMenu
elements.description: Open and close mobile menu button.

elements.title: PrimaryMenu
elements.description: Primary global navigation of the site.

elements.title: SecondaryMenu
elements.description: Secondary global navigation of the site.

elements.title: HeaderSocial
elements.description: Social links in the header area.

utilities.title: borderlist
utilities.description: A list with a border in between the elements.

utilities.title: brandlist
utilities.description: A list with a special style specific to the brand (usually colored bullets).

utilities.title: commalist
utilities.description: An inline list seperated by a comma.

utilities.title: pipelist
utilities.description: An inline list seperated by a vertical line.

utilities.title: nub
utilities.description: A small visual element to highlight something. Usually a tiny rectangle.
